Text.Page:
Argh, my head... I'm so frustrated by the stupid faeries whenever I go out to log. Their buzzing sound gives me a headache that never goes away! I've got to do something about this!

But my headache returns every time I'm even near this area. Hey, you! Get rid of the {@LinkCreature:2#52#faerie vigilantes} for me and bring back their wings!

I can't live like this anymore. Please help.
Phew... now I can hear myself. Thanks! Well, since you helped out, take this. I insist!
I've had enough with this noise! I beg you to get rid of the faeries, please!
